_sText:
- BA_JAIL_BLADE_V2|________________
|- Indoor and outdoor Jailbreak map with|
| thought of gameplay and visual content|
|as well as fun minigames within the map|
-----------------------------------------
__________________
|Special features:
|Ice Hockey Field*
|Gun Toss ramp
|Shot for Shot room
|Grenade Toss Field* (View screenshot)
|Hidden shortcuts and weapons
|Player vs Player Ice Racing
|Armory with Weapon Spawners (2sec delay)
|Medic, Pool, Isolation
-----------------------

Easy to navigate in and takes no time to
know the whole map. If you comment and
ask for it I will upload a list of every
secret in the map with pictures.
_____________
|Few secrets:
|If you find a grenade in your cell, throw it towards the button to open the cells and cells will open if you damaged it.
|On the Grenade Toss field you can jump into the arrow on the left to be teleported to armory.
|Jumping onto the bookcase in the basement VIP room and crouching along will get you teleported to the Shot for Shot field where you will land on a Desert Eagle
|Jumping off the bridge at the pool and onto the wall to the right when you face the GAMES sign will make you hit a full-wall ladder. Use it to go up in the corner and knife/shoot the wall you reach (on the top) to see a hidden room and get an AWP
|Look down the gap at the Ice Race and you can see a little platform. Jump down onto it and crouch in to get teleported to armory.


-

V2 UPDATES:
- Made a basement as well as a couple secrets
- Fixed a couple of errors
- Put a delay on weapon and grenade spawners
